name: FindEntity

returns.name: handle
returns.desc: Handle to first entity with specified tag or zero if not found

examples: --You may use this function in a similar way to other "Find functions" like FindBody, FindShape, FindVehicle, etc.
--If you do not specify the tag, the first element found will be returned
--If the type is not specified, the search will be performed for all types of entity
description: Returns an entity with the specified tag and type. This is a universal method that is an alternative to FindBody, FindShape, FindVehicle, etc.
